name: Alimo - NG 'Summer Time' - Full set collectors airdrop + physical

metadata.name: Ridge life
metadata.description:
A Nifty Gateway curated drop by Alimo, on May 25th, 2023.

Collection:  
’Summer Time’

Story:  
Growing up and even now, the feeling is undeniable whenever the sun shines in the Summer. It triggers an urge to gather your friends and head to the local lake for a refreshing swim. This was a regular occurrence for me and my friends, whether we sought out a hidden swimming hole or visited a familiar lake or river to spend the day. Those moments held a special place in our hearts as we loaded up the car and embarked on a day of fun with our friends or family.

These four pieces of art evoke a sense of nostalgia, reminding us of the joy of being outdoors, breathing in fresh air, and fully embracing the present moment with friends. Even on rainy days, these images transport you back to those cherished experiences, igniting the anticipation of your next lake day.


Full collector set:  
Collectors who hold all four works at 12 pm PT on June 1st will get a FREE 1/1 airdrop + physical watercolor from my ideation phase. Thank you so much for believing in my work and I hope you enjoy this piece!
